text: Allakh ustanovil Zapretnyy (dlya grekha) Dom - Ka'abu - Pristanishchem lyudey (yedinoy very); A takzhe i zapretnyy mesyats, I zhertvennykh zhivotnykh, I ukrashen'ya, (chto povesheny na nikh, Chtob otlichit' ikh ot obychnykh). I eto dlya togo, chtoby vy znali: Allakhu, istinno, izvestno vse, Chto na zemle i v nebe (proiskhodit), - Allakh o vsyakoy veshchi znayushch
